item.title: Scientists Froth on Surf Stoke
item.description:
Scientists Froth on Surf Stoke

We all surf for different reasons - for health and fitness, adventure, experience, or just to be out in the ocean. Whatever our motivation, every surfer knows the feeling of surf stoke.

item.title: A Crocheted Wearable Mermaid Tail Towel That Cleverly Transforms Into Its Own Transport Bag
item.description:
A Crocheted Wearable Mermaid Tail Towel That Cleverly Transforms Into Its Own Transport Bag

Canadian crocheter MJ of MJ's Off the Hook Designs has created an adorable line of wearable mermaid tail towels that very cleverly button up and neatly transform into their own carry bags, either as a backpack or a handled arm bag. The pattern for this unique towel is also available for purchase.

item.title: Hope Spots: An Actionable Plan to Save the Ocean
item.description:
Hope Spots: An Actionable Plan to Save the Ocean

The immense problems facing the ocean often leave us feeling powerless. But what if there was a concrete, actionable strategy to nurse the ocean back to health? Dr. Sylvia Earle argues that there is.
